rules_text:
{W}{U} ARTIFACTS Defend the realm with fabled relics of old.
{U}{B} COUNTERS Show your knightly prowess with +1/+1 counters.
{B}{R} GRAVEYARD Honor the fables of the past and care about the graveyard.
{R}{G} BIG ADVENTURE Ramp towards a big finale with adventure cards.
{G}{W} HUMANS Honor the knightly courts and gather your Human troops.
{W}{B} LIFEGAIN Eat, drink, and be merry with rewards for gaining life.
{B}{G} MORBID Not all fairy tales have a happy ending. Make death memorable.
{G}{U} ENCHANTMENTS Defend the Green Knight with an enchanting presence.
{U}{R} NON-HUMANS All sorts of creatures inhabit the magical wilds. Gather them together to win.
{R}{W} AGGRO ADVENTURE Bring ruin to your enemies quickly, with adventures keeping the pressure on.
